quote: Nothing in the world is more dangerous than sincere ignorance and conscientious stupidity.
Prejudice and self-sufficiency naturally proceed from inexperience of the world, and ignorance of mankind.
A jury is composed of twelve men of average ignorance.
A person is never happy except at the price of some ignorance.
A person must have a certain amount of intelligent ignorance to get anywhere.
Admiration is the daughter of ignorance.
All I know is just what I read in the papers, and that's an alibi for my ignorance.
All wonder is the effect of novelty on ignorance.
All you need in this life is ignorance and confidence, and then Success is sure.
All you need in this life is ignorance and confidence; then succes is sure.
All you need in this life is ignorance and confidence; then success is sure.
America is becoming so educated that ignorance will be a novelty. I will belong to the select few.
Nothing in the world is more dangerous than sincere ignorance and conscientious stupidity.
Prejudice and self-sufficiency naturally proceed from inexperience of the world, and ignorance of mankind.
A jury is composed of twelve men of average ignorance.
A person is never happy except at the price of some ignorance.
A person must have a certain amount of intelligent ignorance to get anywhere.
Admiration is the daughter of ignorance.
All I know is just what I read in the papers, and that's an alibi for my ignorance.
All wonder is the effect of novelty on ignorance.
All you need in this life is ignorance and confidence, and then Success is sure.
All you need in this life is ignorance and confidence; then succes is sure.
All you need in this life is ignorance and confidence; then success is sure.
America is becoming so educated that ignorance will be a novelty. I will belong to the select few.
And seeing ignorance is the curse of God, Knowledge the wing wherewith we fly to heaven.
Art has an enemy called ignorance.
Atheism is the result of ignorance and pride; of strong sense and feeble reasons; of good eating and ill living.
Be ignorance thy choice, where knowledge leads to woe.
Behind every argument is someone's ignorance.
Boredom comes simply from ignorance and lack of imagination.
Children's talent to endure stems from their ignorance of alternatives.
Conflict grows out of ignorance and suspicion.
Democracy is a pathetic belief in the collective wisdom of individual ignorance.
Dignity is a mask we wear to hide our ignorance.
Education is a progressive discovery of our ignorance.
Education is a progressive discovery of our own ignorance.
Education is the path from cocky ignorance to miserable uncertainty.
Education is the progressive realization of our ignorance.
Everything you need in this life is ignorance and confidence, and then success is sure.
Fear always springs from ignorance.
Fear is the lengthened shadow of ignorance.
From ignorance our comfort flows, the only wretched are the wise.
He was distinguished for ignorance; for he had only one idea, and that was wrong.
His ignorance is encyclopedic.
How difficult it is to save the bark of reputation from the rocks of ignorance.
I believe in the forgiveness of sin and the redemption of ignorance.
I do not believe in the collective wisdom of individual ignorance.
I say there is no darkness but ignorance.
I would rather have my ignorance than another man's knowledge, because I have so much of it.
If I don't have wisdom, I can teach you only ignorance.
If knowledge can create problems, it is not through ignorance that we can solve them.
Ignorance and error are necessary to life, like bread and water.
Ignorance and inconsideration are the two great causes of the ruin of mankind.
Ignorance breeds monsters to fill up the vacancies of the soul that are unoccupied by the verities of knowledge.
Ignorance is bold and knowledge reserved.
Ignorance is like a delicate fruit; touch it, and the bloom is gone.
Ignorance is never out of style. It was in fashion yesterday, it is the rage today and it will set the pace tomorrow.
Ignorance is not innocence but sin
Ignorance is not innocence but sin.
Ignorance is not innocence, but sin.
Ignorance is stubborn and prejudice is hard.
Ignorance is the curse of God, knowledge the wing wherewith we fly to heaven.
Ignorance is the night of the mind, but a night without moon or star.
Ignorance makes most men go into a political party, and shame keeps them from getting out of it.
Ignorance of one's misfortunes is clear gain.
Ignorance of the law excuses no man from practicing it.
Innocence dwells with Wisdom, but never with Ignorance.
Is sloppiness in speech caused by ignorance or apathy? I don't know and I don't care.
It is certain, in any case, that ignorance, allied with power, is the most ferocious enemy justice can have.
It is harder to conceal ignorance than to acquire knowledge.
It is not the insurrections of ignorance that are dangerous, but the revolts of the intelligence.
It takes considerable knowledge just to realize the extent of your own ignorance.
It's innocence when it charms us, ignorance when it doesn't.
Knowledge is the small part of ignorance that we arrange and classify.
Lawyers are the only persons in whom ignorance of the law is not punished.
Learning. The kind of ignorance distinguishing the studious.
Most ignorance is evincible ignorance. We don't know because we don't want to know.
Most ignorance is vincible ignorance. We don't know because we don't want to know.
Not ignorance, but ignorance of ignorance, is the death of knowledge.
Nothing in education is so astonishing as the amount of ignorance it accumulates in the form of inert facts.
Nothing is more terrible than to see ignorance in action.
One who limits himself to his chosen mode of ignorance.
Opinion is the medium between knowledge and ignorance.
Our ignorance of history causes us to slander our own times.
Our knowledge is a receding mirage in an expanding desert of ignorance.
Paranoia is just another word for ignorance.
Point me out the happy man and I will point you out either egotism, selfishness, evil - or else an absolute ignorance.
Prejudice is just another word for ignorance.
Prejudice is the child of ignorance.
Prejudice is the child of ignorance.
Quotations are useful in periods of ignorance or obscurantist beliefs.
Real knowledge is to know the extent of one's ignorance.
Real knowledge is to know the extent of ones ignorance.
Religion. A daughter of Hope and Fear, explaining to Ignorance the nature of the Unknowable.
Science is but the exchange of ignorance for that which is another kind of ignorance.
Science, after all, is only an expression for our ignorance of our own ignorance.
Sixty years ago I knew everything; now I know nothing; education is a progressive discovery of our own ignorance.
Sophistry is only fit to make men more conceited in their ignorance.
Superior knowledge is a mistake; that which rules the world is superior ignorance.
The amplest knowledge has the largest faith. Ignorance is always incredulous.
The beginning of an acquaintance whether with persons or things is to get a definite outline of our ignorance.
The doorstep to the temple of wisdom is the knowledge of our own ignorance.
The essence of knowledge is, having it, to apply it; not having it, to confess your ignorance.
The greater our knowledge increases, the greater our ignorance unfolds.
The greater the ignorance the greater the dogmatism.
The greatest obstacle to discovery is not ignorance - it is the illusion of knowledge.
The greatest pride, or the greatest despondency, is the greatest ignorance of one's self.
The highest form of ignorance is when you reject something you don't know anything about.
The ignorance of one voter in a democracy impairs the security of all.
The little I know I owe to my ignorance.
The magic of first love is our ignorance that it can ever end.
The magic of first love is our ignorance that it can never end.
The more we study the more we discover our ignorance.
The more we study the more we discover our ignorance.
The older we grow the greater becomes our wonder at how much ignorance one can contain without bursting one's clothes.
The only good is knowledge and the only evil is ignorance.
The opposite of love is not hate, the opposite of love is ignorance.
The pleasures of ignorance are as great in their way, as the pleasures of knowledge.
The quantity of books in a person's library, is often a cloud of witnesses to the ignorance of the owner.
The reason there's so much ignorance is that those who have it are so eager to share it.
The trouble with most folks ain't so much their ignorance as knowing so many things that ain't so.
The truest characters of ignorance are vanity and pride and arrogance.
The truth is incontrovertible. Malice may attack it and ignorance may deride it, but in the end, there it is.
There is no darkness, but ignorance.
There is nothing more frightful than ignorance in action.
There is one principle that can keep a man in everlasting ignorance.  That is contempt prior to investigation.
There is only one good - knowledge; and only one evil - ignorance.
To be ignorant of one's ignorance is the malady of the ignorant.
To succeed in life, you need two things: ignorance and confidence.
True friendship can afford true knowledge. It does not depend on darkness and ignorance.
True modesty does not consist in an ignorance of our merits, but in a due estimate of them.
True, a little learning is a dangerous thing, but it still beats total ignorance.
Truth will always be truth, regardless of lack of understanding, disbelief or ignorance.
We fear things in proportion to our ignorance of them.
Where ignorance is bliss, 't is folly to be wise.
Anybody can write a three-volume novel. It merely requires a complete ignorance of both life and literature.
